headline: 2 Super Growth Stocks Down 34% and 61% to Buy on the Dip
summary: Today, I'll examine two examples of businesses facing this phenomenon and explain why these two growth stocks appear to be super buy-the-dip candidates.  The Trade Desk (NASDAQ: TTD) is a data-driven digital platform for ad buyers, whether they are brands themselves or their publishers.  The Trade Desk's leading platform operates independently on the buy-side -- as opposed to the walled gardens of Alphabet, Meta Platforms, and Amazon -- granting it a level of subjectivity its mega peers can't match.
